SQL.LOAD: Select product_code_detail_id, product_code_parent_id, product_code_id, effective, expiration, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date From elp_product_code_detail where product_code_detail_id =:product_code_detail_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: Select RAWTOHEX(aa.product_code_parent_id) product_code_parent_id, aa.product_code_detail_id, bb.product_code child_product_code, aa.effective, aa.expiration, dd.dealer_id, dd.dealer dealer_code, comp.code company_code, comp.company_id from elp_product_code_detail aa, elp_product_code bb, elp_dealer dd, elp_company comp where aa.product_code_id=bb.product_code_id and bb.dealer_id=dd.dealer_id and dd.company_id=comp.company_id and bb.Product_code_id in (Select pcd.product_code_id from elp_product_code_parent pcp, elp_product_code_detail pcd,elp_dealer d,elp_product_code pc where pcp.product_code_parent_id =pcd.product_code_parent_id and pc.dealer_id = d.dealer_id and pc.product_code_id=pcp.product_code_id and pcp.product_code_id= :product_code_id and d.dealer_id=:dealer_id )
SQL.ChildListByParentID: Select comp.code, comp.company_id, dr.dealer, dr.dealer_id, product_code, dc.product_code_id, dc.effective, dc.expiration, dc.product_code_detail_id, dc.product_code_parent_id, dc.created_by, dc.created_date, dc.modified_by, dc.modified_date from elp_product_code_detail dc, elp_product_code dt, elp_dealer dr, elp_company comp where dc.product_code_parent_id=:product_code_parent_id and dc.product_code_id = dt.product_code_id and dt.dealer_id=dr.dealer_id and dr.company_id=comp.company_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_product_code_detail SET product_code_parent_id =:product_code_parent_id, product_code_id = :product_code_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by, WHERE product_code_detail_id = :product_code_detail_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_product_code_detail ( product_code_parent_id, product_code_id, effective, expiration, created_by ) VALUES ( :product_code_parent_id, :product_code_id, :effective, :expiration, :created_by )
